revised_title: Observations on the Permanent Spot in Jupiter and a Dispute over Optic Glasses
tldr: The article discusses the discovery of Jupiter's permanent spot and a dispute between Eustachio de Divinis and P. Gotignies over the invention of this observation. It also mentions a comparison between Divinis' and Campani's telescopes and Divinis' claim to determine the quality of an object glass by looking at it.
